name: Nico Robin

trigger.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Play this card.

text: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from the top of your Life cards: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from the top of your Life cards: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.
